From: Ezra

Dust

In that magnified moment

My vision shrouded by gregarious light

Flickered, my heart

Cast your illumination into my damnation


Terror beset my hidden desire

Dancing away and filled with radiance


A fools fallacy

There standing at the edge of one's own galaxy

A star's light far and away,

It's light long dead


It's warmth still burning me to the bone;

To dust



By Ezra V.
